solution_line_template: Since there are {ml_per_liter} ml in 1 liter, then {container_liters} liters is equal to {ml_per_liter} x {container_liters} = <<{container_liters}*{ml_per_liter}={total_ml}>>{total_ml} ml.
Thus, Jasmine can pour {total_ml}/{portion_ml} = <<{total_ml}/{portion_ml}={num_portions}>>{num_portions} portions of {portion_ml} ml milk.
